thread.title_full: Danramil dan PPL Kecamatan Burneh Bangkalan Pantau Tanaman Padi

posts.author: portal komando (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Danramil dan PPL Kecamatan Burneh Bangkalan Pantau Tanaman Padi
posts.text:
Bangkalan,- Komandan Rayon Militer (Danramil) 0829/04 Burneh Kodim 0829/Bangkalan Kapten Inf M Hayat didampingi Babinsa dan PPL Kecamatan Burneh bersama Kelompok Tani Ngokse Tani 3 memantau perkembangan tanaman padi di Desa Tonjung Kecamatan Burneh Kabupaten Bangkalan, Selasa (7/11/2017). 

Para Babinsa ikut terjun ke sawah karena produksi di lahan pertanian setempat mengalami penurunan dan kegiatan membantu petani untuk bersinergi dengan program pemerintah pusat mengenai ketahanan pangan. 

Sebelumnya, Babinsa dan kelompok tani desa setempat melakukan penanaman padi dengan pola jajar legowo. 

“Tidak semua petani memahami dan setuju terhadap pola jajar legowo, tetapi berdasarkan teori ahli, sistem ini mampu meningkatkan produktifitas sekitar 30 persen perhektarenya,” pungkas Danramil Kapten Inf M. Hayat.

thread.section_title: 频道列表-百家号
thread.title: 童大焕：剧变时代的大财富机会
thread.title_full: 童大焕：剧变时代的大财富机会 -百家号

posts.author: 功夫财经
posts.title: 童大焕：剧变时代的大财富机会
posts.text:
摘要：1998年以来，20年间，出现了中国历史上几乎没有过的财富奇迹，与之唇齿相依的是巨大的财富分化：两个儿时的伙伴，完全相同的教育和家庭背景，买了房的和没有买房的，财富差别巨大；衣锦还乡回家盖房的，和在大
1998年以来，20年间，出现了中国历史上几乎没有过的财富奇迹，与之唇齿相依的是巨大的财富分化：两个儿时的伙伴，完全相同的教育和家庭背景，买了房的和没有买房的，财富差别巨大；衣锦还乡回家盖房的，和在大城市买老破小的，财富差别同样巨大。
放眼世界，发现这居然是当下全球共有的现象，并非中国特色，乃至于法国学者托马斯·皮克蒂不由得惊呼：资产性收入已经在财富占比中远超劳务性收入，成为财富的主流，而且占比越来越大。他为此写了2014年度轰动全球的畅销书《21世纪的资本论》，并且断言：货币时代，工资不是主流，投资之神才受追捧。
现象摆在那里，谁都知道。关键在于要懂得现象背后的原因。我们的大脑必须配得上这个时代，才能配得上自己的财富。如果你不知道房价涨跌背后的原因，那么，即使曾经拥有，也会很容易失去。反之，如果你拥有一颗配得上时代的大脑，即使白手起家，今天一无所有，明天也可能财务自由甚至富可敌国。
受功夫财经邀请，我在这里开设专栏，未来的一段时间里，我准备用十篇文章，剖析这个剧烈变革的时代，和剧烈变革下房地产的财富逻辑。希望能够帮助各位深陷投资困惑的朋友，找到新的方向。
为什么房产会成为决定财富的根本力量
回答这个问题前，先要知道两句异曲同工的话，一句来自中国古人，他们说：不谋全局者不足以谋一域，不谋万世者不足以谋一生。一句来自西方哲学大师斯宾诺莎，他说：理性是在正确认识全局的基础上采取适当的行动。都是告诉我们，思考问题必须有全局理性思维。
房地产背后的“全局”是什么？是城市化。没有城市化，还停留在农业社会，那么你老家乡下的房子和北京的房子价格，永远不会像今天落差那么大，建筑成本基本上可以涵盖房屋价值。
又是什么原因导致了城市化，改变了上万年的农业历史？背后的“全局”是科技进步。
大家准备好，一个思想小高潮就要来了，下面，是迄今为止，对城市化的过去和未来最精要、最准确的一个总结，总结归纳人是我。这可能是中国乃至全世界范围内，没有第二个比这更精准的归纳了：
时间回到1820年前后，第一次工业革命把人从农业中解放出来，带来工业主导、有限集聚的城市化。世界平均城市化率，从漫长的农业时代长期徘徊在3%左右，一跃而到2000年前后的50%；180年时间，人均GDP增长了8倍（工业革命前1800年时间才增长50%）；
到了2000年前后，以互联网、机器人和人工智能为标志的第二次工业革命，将把人从工业中解放出来，进入服务业主导、非物质生产为主流、无限集聚的超级大城市化。由此带来的城市和财富版图变迁，会像社会层面的地壳运动一样，小部分地区像珠穆朗玛峰高高耸立，大部分城市和乡村将迅速陷落。而且，更重要的是，这个剧变的速度会越来越快，但是大部分人对此感觉不到。等感觉得到的时候，调整自己的财富和就业配置已经来不及了。
不是说从此不需要工农业这些物质生产了，而是工业和农业都不再需要多少劳动力了。就像美国，贵为世界第一大农业国，而且绝对总量还在增加，但它的农业人口只占总人口1%，农业GDP只占全国GDP1.2%（相对比重还会降低），美国一个农民，可以养活130多个世界人民。
而城市，自始至终归根结底是人的城市，因人而城，因人而市，人聚财聚，人散财散。
财富逻辑被颠覆 权力和金钱让位于智慧
很多人一直在哀嚎什么阶层固化，一直在强调权力、金钱和社会关系，但我要强调，现在这个科技是第一生产力的社会剧变时代，是千年未有的、最好的阶层逆袭、阶层升降的时代。科技、互联网、商业能力、城市化观念及其观念下买对房子的能力，是决定阶层迅速坠落还是迅速上升的基因，一句话：智慧取代传统的金钱和权力，成为决定贫富的主因。
2017年10月12日，据胡润研究院最新发布的《36计•胡润百富榜2017》显示，37岁的张邦鑫以400亿财富首次成为“80后”白手起家首富，位列百富榜第48位。而在该榜单中，国内最有影响力的另一家民办教育机构新东方的创始人俞敏洪，以160亿财富位列第199位。
像张邦鑫这样的例子越来越多。富豪越来越年轻化，越来越智本化。不需要什么家庭背景，只需要一颗智慧的头脑，和一颗勇敢的心。过去成就一个超级富豪，非两三代人的功夫不可，现在，三五年可能就够了。
全球最大的出租车公司Uber没有一辆出租车；全球最热门的媒体所有者 Facebook没有一个内容制作人；全球市值最高的零售商阿里巴巴没有一件库存商品；全球最大的住宿服务提供商Airbnb没有任何房产。这就是非物质生产时代，这就是智慧时代。
上面这些，跟城市化和房地产有什么关系？关系太大了，简直是一枚硬币正反两面的关系：越是服务业和非物质生产占主流，人口和城市就越集聚。因为集聚带来效率，带来创新的浓度，带来智慧、能量、产业、分工的核聚变。有人说20年前很多行业还是蓝海，所以到大城市容易混。但其实20年后诞生了更多的蓝海：快递，直播，电商，房产中介（市场更大了），人工智能，美容，教育，智慧产业……
在这样的时代，我们必须建立起以下重要观念：
①土地是财富之母的农业老皇历必须抛弃，特定的城市空间才是财富之母；
②走出黄金本位、货币本位，进化到房本位；
③从权力本位、金钱本位、关系本位，进化到智慧本位。
有人问：“60后/70后相信知识改变命运，最后却是房产改变了命运；80后/90后相信房产改变命运，但最终将怎样改变命运呢？ ”大焕答：归根结底，都是知识改变命运。因为，同样是买房，买不好会一辈子陷入大坑一世甚至两世不得翻身，买什么样的房产会实现远高于工资收入的财富增长螺旋，背后的关键，就是你掌握了什么样的知识！这个知识，才是与时代剧变最贴近的知识，而不是教科书里陈旧的知识。
选择大于努力：与趋势为伍，最大的借力是借势
任何人都不能与趋势为敌。
看一个时代的历史变迁，不要看激动人心的宣言，而要看静水流深的科技进步，以及，科技进步背后的产业结构调整、个人、家庭、企业和政府的财务状况。中国已然进入服务业、非物质生产主导的超级大城市化时代，这样的时代，世界上没有任何经验可循，惟正确理论可抵达未来。
近年来，我国服务业增加值一路上涨，到2016年，达到了384221亿元，在国民经济中的比重上升到了51.6%，比工业高出了11.8个百分点，足足擎起国民经济半壁江山，成为拉动中国经济增长的第一大产业。
我们一定要看懂趋势，以空杯心态看懂潮流，看懂未来。不要用农业社会和工业时代那点知识，来思考未来知识爆炸、服务业时代的超级城市化。
与趋势为敌，注定被时代远远抛下。要刮骨疗毒一般剜去身上归隐田园的精神鸦片，拥抱城市，就是拥抱自由与财富。
永远不要用愿望替代理性和专业分析。人类千万年均衡发展的梦想永远不可能实现，因为它不符合经济规律。谁要强行实践，必是人类灾难。这已经为无数实践所证明。经济发展的结果一定是分化，城市之间，人与人之间，只会差异越来越大。“这是经济的规律！你要追随经济的规律，而不是试图让这世界为你私人打造一个规律。”
你独立行走的第一步始于相信规律，你的关注点在哪里，你的未来就在哪里。你关注权力，就只配权力能给你的部分；你关注规律和潮流，就收获规律和潮流能给你的部分。人生最大的借力，不是借钱，不是借权，不是借关系，而是借时代发展潮流之力。
握紧潮流 你也可能成为巴菲特
投资大师、“戴维斯双杀效应”的发明者斯尔必·科伦·戴维斯(Shelby Cullom Davis)，1947年以5万美元起家，45年赚18000倍(9亿美元)，年回报23%。
我评论说：“年均回报23%，我想不算多。在史无前例的城市化机会面前，我想我的房产投资可以秒杀他。”我有一点没有信心的是，我从2002年开始能不能坚持45年，因为寿命不由我说了算。但我估计35年左右达到他的效果应该没问题。因为正确的房产投资有一个“自动复利”的收益，还有一个“多重复利”的收益。非常详细的，我就不公开说了。
把握正确的城市化方向，掌握正确的楼市投资技巧，房产投资，算上杠杆，平均年回报20%只是起步。有人从1957年跟踪巴菲特合伙基金，到2010年共计53年。
第一阶段从1957年到1964年共8年，年化收益率是28%；
第二阶段从1965年到1984年共20年，年化收益率是22%；
第三阶段从1985年到2004年共20年，年化收益率大约是22%；
第四阶段从2005年到2009年共5年，总收益53%。
城市化背景下的房产投资，比这还轻松。坚定的信念，正确的方向与方法，和时间做朋友，你也有可能做房地产领域的巴菲特。

thread.title: Sunoco LP names Joe Kim as chief executive officer
thread.title_full: Sunoco LP names Joe Kim as chief executive officer

posts.author: Retail News Editor
posts.title: Sunoco LP names Joe Kim as chief executive officer
posts.text:
Facebook 
DALLAS, 2017-Nov-07 — / EPR Retail News / — Sunoco LP (NYSE: SUN) (“Sunoco” or the “Partnership”) announced today (Nov. 6, 2017) that Joe Kim has been named chief executive officer of Dallas-based Sunoco LP, effective January 1, 2018. Kim has been serving as president and chief operating officer since June following the announcement that current Chief Executive Officer Bob Owens would retire from the Partnership as of December 31, 2017. Owens will continue to serve as a consultant to the Partnership through 2019. 
Prior to his most recent appointment, Kim had been serving as executive vice president and chief development officer for Sunoco from October 2015 to June 2017, where he was responsible for all business development and merger and acquisition activities across the Partnership. During his service with Sunoco, Kim has provided a wealth of experience and expertise in strategic planning and execution of growth initiatives. 
Previously, Kim held the position of chief operating officer at Pizza Hut, where he was responsible for management of all operations, with an emphasis on speed to market and restaurant excellence. Prior to that, he worked for fifteen years at Valero Energy where his most recent position was senior vice president of strategy and growth. He also held roles in field and franchise operations, strategic planning, merchandising, development and investor relations. He began his career with Arthur Andersen Business Consulting. Kim is a graduate of Trinity University in San Antonio, Texas with a bachelor’s degree in business administration. 
“I would like to extend a heartfelt thank you to Bob for his more than 20 years of service to Sunoco. We are grateful for his strategic leadership and wish him well as he embarks on his new endeavor,” said Matthew S. Ramsey, chairman of the board of Sunoco LP. “Bob is leaving Sunoco in good hands. Joe is an exceptionally talented leader and he is poised to successfully complete the transformation of the Partnership from a retail-based business into the premier U.S. fuel supplier.” 
Sunoco LP (NYSE: SUN) is a master limited partnership that operates 1,346 convenience stores and retail fuel sites and distributes motor fuel to 7,898 convenience stores, independent dealers, commercial customers and distributors located in 30 states. Our parent — Energy Transfer Equity, L.P. (NYSE: ETE) — owns SUN’s general partner and incentive distribution rights. For more information visit sunocolp.com. 
Forward-Looking Statements 
This press release may include certain statements concerning expectations for the future that are forward-looking statements as defined by federal law. Such forward-looking statements are subject to a variety of known and unknown risks, uncertainties, and other factors that are difficult to predict and many of which are beyond management’s control. An extensive list of factors that can affect future results are discussed in the Partnership’s Annual Report on Form 10-K and other documents filed from time to time with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The Partnership undertakes no obligation to update or revise any forward-looking statement to reflect new information or events.

posts.title: К 100-ЛЕТИЮ ОКТЯБРЬСКОЙ РЕВОЛЮЦИИ
posts.text:
Звучат над миром песни, сердце радуя, И славят в них величие страны. Пусть жизнь трудна, другой судьбы не надо мне, Мы верою в Отечество сильны. Кремлёвских звёзд свечение над нами России новый излучают свет. И над Кремлём огнём пылает знамя, Для нас пути иного в жизни нет! 
* * * Над Камой ветер, как шальной, хохочет, Стоит сырая, хмурая погода. Как в октябре семнадцатого года. Светает. Асфальт кипит от капелек дождя. Послевоенный год, я в первом классе, Я постигаю азбуку житья. Азы доходят до меня не очень, Охота хлеба, слушать неохота. А за окном листву роняет осень, Над Камой ветер, как шальной, хохочет. И убежать я не могу с урока Хотя давно зовёт в кино дружок И мне никак нельзя прервать до срока Мой самый первый Ленинский урок. И я сижу. Под ленинским прищуром, Простым и строгим, опускаю взгляд. А за окошком облетает сад, И не звонит техничка тётя Шура. Уйдёшь, а что же скажет Ленин?.. Потом дойдёт до сердца и ума, Что с азбукой в тот год послевоенный Вошла и революция сама.

posts.title: MGM China : Supports DSAL’s Occupational Safety and Health Tour | 4-Traders
posts.text:
MGM Supports DSAL's Occupational Safety and Health Tour 
[November 7, 2017, Macau] Last week, a group of 60 professionals and practitioners from the local hospitality and catering industry visited MGM MACAU for an insightful presentation on MGM's occupational safety and health (OSH) initiatives, followed by a guided tour of the resort's catering operations and award-winning kitchens. 
The Catering Industry Occupational Safety and Health Tour was organized by Labour Affairs Bureau of the Macao SAR Government (DSAL). The activity began with an opening speech by Mr. Wong Chi Hong, D irector of DSAL, who said, 'MGM's excellence in workplace culture and practices will serve as a role model to other practitioners, helping to enhance the overall OSH standards in the local catering industry. This tour provides a great platform for industry practitioners to gain fresh perspectives on improving their OSH.' On the occasion, Mr. Keith Lei, Vice President of Human Resources of MGM , also introduced MGM to the participants and gave them a glimpse of the Company's new and innovative integrated resort, MGM COTAI, slated to open in January 2018. 
To provide participants with an in-depth understanding on how hospitality businesses manage health and safety, Ms. Alice Lao , Director of Risk & Safety of MGM , introduced the Company's best practices in OSH. Led by Mr. Winston Yeung, Executive Director of Risk & Safety of MGM , the group was then taken on a tour of the resort's catering operations including the award-winning kitchens in Square 8, to have an up-close observation on how MGM implements health and safety initiatives in order to create a safe and healthy work environment. 
Workplace health and safety is a prime concern at MGM. Earlier this year, MGM signed the 'Occupational Safety and Health Charter,' an industry-wide commitment to workplace safety initiated by DSAL. The Company also received a total of 15 awards including the silver award in Corporate Safety Performance in the 2 DSAL Catering Industry Occupational Safety and Health Award Program. 
### 
About MGM 
MGM is an abbreviation for MGM China Holdings Limited (HKEx: 2282) and is a leading developer, owner and operator of gaming and lodging resorts in the Greater China region. We are the holding company of MGM Grand Paradise, SA which holds one of the six gaming concessions/subconcessions to run casino games in Macau. MGM Grand Paradise, SA owns and operates MGM MACAU, the award-winning premium integrated resort located on the Macau Peninsula and is developing a second resort, MGM COTAI which is expected to more than double our presence in Macau. 
MGM MACAU is a Forbes Five-Star luxury integrated resort inspired by the arts with every element of the resort infused with creativity and style. MGM MACAU has approximately 600 guest rooms and suites and boasts a number of distinguishing features, including the architecturally stunning European-inspired Grande Praça, housed under a soaring glass ceiling. MGM MACAU's world class facilities include the MGM Art Space, dedicating over 5,000 square feet to display authentic works of art, conference and event facilities, spa, and seven signature restaurants and bars to fulfill any gastronomic craving. Our property is conveniently located on prime waterfront on the Macau Peninsula and is directly connected to the luxury retail shopping complex, One Central. 
Slated to open on January 29, 2018, MGM COTAI is the latest addition to the MGM portfolio in China. Designed as the 'jewelry box' of Cotai, it plans to offer approximately 1,400 hotel rooms and suites, meeting space, high end spa, retail offerings and food and beverage outlets as well as the first international Mansion at MGM for the ultimate luxury experience. MGM COTAI will offer Asia's first dynamic theater and a spectacle to wow every guest who steps foot in the resort. MGM COTAI is being developed to drive greater product diversification and bring more advanced and innovative forms of entertainment to Macau as it grows as a global tourist destination. MGM COTAI is the largest property and the first private sector project ever to achieve the China Green Building (Macau) Design Label Certification. 
MGM China Holdings Limited is majority owned by MGM Resorts International (NYSE: MGM) one of the world's leading global hospitality companies, operating a portfolio of destination resort brands including Bellagio, MGM Grand, Mandalay Bay and The Mirage.

thread.title: Resep Cara Membuat Cumi Goreng Telur Asin
thread.title_full: Resep Cara Membuat Cumi Goreng Telur Asin

posts.author: RadioGsp Pamanukan (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Resep Cara Membuat Cumi Goreng Telur Asin
posts.text: Resep Cara Membuat Cumi Goreng Telur Asin   Mau membuat olahan cumi yang berbeda dari biasanya? Coba bikin cumi goreng telur asin ala Iefa Puspawanti ini. Menu yang satu ini dijamin bakal jadi favorit semua anggota keluarga, lho. Bahan-Bahan 6 butir telur asin, ambil kuningnya saja dan haluskan 65 gram tepung terigu gula dan bubuk penyedap rasa, secukupnya 1 tangkai daun kari 1 sdt garam Cara Membuat 1. Cuci bersih cumi-cumi, buang kulit hitamnya, dan gunakan bagian badannya saja lalu potong bentuk cincin. 2. Rendam cumi dengan air perasan jeruk nipis, garam, dan merica. Simpan di kulkas selama 10 menit. 3. Racik bahan kulit cumi dengan mencampurkan tepung terigu, tepung maizena, garam, dan bumbu penyedap. 4. Masukkan cumi-cumi ke dalam racikan bahan kulit cumi. 5. Panaskan minyak, goreng cumi hingga kecoklatan. Angkat dan tiriskan. 6. Cairkan mentega, masukkan kuning telur yang sudah dihaluskan, aduk sampai berbusa. 7. Masukkan daun kari dalam tumisan kuning telur. 8. Masukkan cumi goreng, tambahkan garam dan penyedap rasa bila perlu. 9. Masak hingga bumbu meresap.   Posting Lebih Baru

thread.section_title: gspradio
thread.title: Resep Cah Brokoli Bumbu Bawang Putih Gurih Bikin Nagih
thread.title_full: Resep Cah Brokoli Bumbu Bawang Putih Gurih Bikin Nagih

posts.author: RadioGsp Pamanukan (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Resep Cah Brokoli Bumbu Bawang Putih Gurih Bikin Nagih
posts.text: Resep Cah Brokoli Bumbu Bawang Putih Gurih Bikin Nagih RadioGsp Pamanukan Selasa, 07 November 2017 0 No comments Tips GSP - Memasak masakan yang enak dan menggugah selera tak harus dengan memanfaatkan bahan masakan mahal seperti halnya daging atau ikan lho ladies. Dengan memanfaatkan sayur-sayuran hijau seperti brokoli sebenarnya kita bisa membuat masakan super lezat, bikin nagih dan pastinya sehat. Penasaran seperti apa resepnya? Simak yang berikut ini. Bahan 2 bungkul brokoli (potong sesuai selera) 4 siung bawang putih (iris tipis) Lada bubuk (secukupnya) Bawang merah goreng (secukupnya, sesuai selera) Minyak goreng (secukupnya) Panaskan minyak, tumis bawang putih hingga harum. Masukkan sayur brokoli yang sudah dipotong-potong dan cuci, aduk rata. Tambahkan garam, gula, kaldu ayam bubuk dan lada secukupnya, masak hingga brokoli matang. Tambahkan sedikit air jika ingin brokoli matang sempurna dan wajan tidak gosong. Jika cah brokoli sudah matang, angkat sajikan. Taburkan bawang merah goreng di atas sajian ini dan nikmati sensasi nikmatnya. Resep cara membuat cah brokoli yang sangat sederhana bukan? Walau sangat sederhana, menu ini sangat enak dan menggugah selera lho. Selamat mencoba dan semoga keluarga di rumah suka. Share ! Terimakasih telah berkunjung di GSP Radio. « Posting Lebih Baru

posts.title: NeuVector Raises $7 Million in Series A Funding
posts.text:
NeuVector Raises $7 Million in Series A Funding By 0 
Hummer Winblad Venture Partners leads round to scale NeuVector's enterprise-ready container firewall security solution 
SAN JOSE, CA–(Marketwired – Nov 7, 2017) – NeuVector , which delivers continuous network security for containers, today announced it has raised $7 million in Series A. 
The funding round, led by Hummer Winblad Venture Partners , comes amid accelerated enterprise adoption of NeuVector's solution. The round will be used to significantly expand the sales and engineering teams supporting the cloud-native container firewall. 
As more enterprises turn to containers for deploying business-critical applications, the need to inspect and secure all internal traffic within these container environments has become increasingly clear. Data breaches and zero-day attacks are becoming more common and dangerous — and containers are not immune. As enterprises continue to discover, containers are no less vulnerable to crippling security gaps than legacy systems. Containers in production environments prove particularly challenging to secure, as IT teams dynamically deploy, move, and scale them to make efficient use of host and data center resources. 
Launched in January 2017, NeuVector combines cloud-native intelligence with traditional network and firewall security to effectively automate container protections. Unlike other solutions in the market, the container firewall security solution — itself a container that can be easily added to existing container environments — leverages behavioral learning to automatically recognize and whitelist normal behavior, applying zero-configuration security policies that safeguard container traffic. 
“Enterprises are increasingly tapping into the power of containers for application deployment — and the bad guys have taken notice,” said Fei Huang, CEO, NeuVector. “What we want to offer is the most secure, most automatic, and most complete container security solution available. From our launch earlier this year to today's Series A funding, the feedback from our customers has made it clear that the NeuVector solution fills a crucial gap in container security. We're excited to build on the confidence our customers have placed in us as we continue to improve and expand our solution going forward.” 
The NeuVector solution provides application-layer segmentation to fully isolate container traffic, enabling it to proactively detect and block all suspicious connections within the container environment before malicious software or attackers can do any harm. In this way, NeuVector delivers continuous network container security that protects application containers throughout the build, ship, and runtime phases of devops. This includes runtime vulnerability scanning active across all running containers and hosts, and threat detection designed to mitigate attempted DDoS, DNS, and other attacks. 
“As we talk to CIOs, it's clear that containers are being rapidly adopted by enterprises as the future for how applications are delivered,” said Lars Leckie, Managing Director, Hummer Winblad. “The missing piece for mass adoption is the runtime security that NeuVector provides, and the traction that NeuVector has seen since launching shows how critical network security is to running containers in production. We're excited to partner with NeuVector to help grow the team and business.” 
About NeuVector 
NeuVector, the leading container firewall company, delivers a Docker security solution with a zero-configuration policy that adapts to the changing environment and secures containers during run-time. Founded by industry veterans from Fortinet, VMware, and Trend Micro, NeuVector has developed patent-pending behavioral learning for containers with the vision of simple, scalable network security for containers.

thread.title: Ποιος φρενάρει τελικά την οικογενειακή επανένωση;
thread.title_full: Ποιος φρενάρει τελικά την οικογενειακή επανένωση;

posts.author: Αντιμνημονιακός (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Ποιος φρενάρει τελικά την οικογενειακή επανένωση;
posts.text: Ποιος φρενάρει τελικά την οικογενειακή επανένωση; 7/11/2017«Δεν ευσταθούν τα περί συμφωνίας Βερολίνου-Αθήνας προκειμένου να καθυστερήσει η διαδικασία οικογενειακής επανένωσης προσφύγων», δηλώνει ο εκπρόσωπος του γερμανικού υπουργείου Εσωτερικών Γιοχάνες Ντίμροτ. Το Βερολίνο απορρίπτει τις κατηγορίες για καθυστερήσεις οικογενειακών επανενώσεων προσφύγων, που ζουν στη Γερμανία με μέλη των οικογενειών τους από την Ελλάδα. Ο εκπρόσωπος του γερμανικού υπουργείου Εσωτερικών Γιοχάνες Ντίμροτ δήλωσε στο Βερολίνο ότι δεν ευσταθούν όσα λέγονται και γράφονται για σχετική συμφωνία μεταξύ Βερολίνου και Αθήνας. Εν τω μεταξύ, όπως μεταδίδει το Γερμανικό Πρακτορείο Ειδήσεων από την Αθήνα, στην πλατεία Συντάγματος συνεχίζεται η απεργία πείνας 20 προσφύγων, κυρίως γυναικών και παιδιών, με αίτημα την οικογενειακή επανένωση με συγγενείς τους που ζουν στη Γερμανία. Η Αμίρα, η οποία έχει ένα μικρό παιδί, δηλώνει στο DPA: «ο σύζυγός μου είναι στη Γερμανία. Περιμένουμε εδώ και 19 μήνες». Σχεδόν 2.000 πρόσφυγες μετέβησαν από την Ελλάδα στη Γερμανία Σύμφωνα με στοιχεία του γερμανικού υπουργείου Εσωτερικών του πρώτους 9 μήνες του τρέχοντος έτους 1.921 πρόσφυγες ήρθαν από την Ελλάδα στη Γερμανία στο πλαίσιο της οικογενειακής επανένωσης, όπως προβλέπει ο Κανονισμός Δουβλίνο ΙΙΙ. Πιο συγκεκριμένα ο Κανονισμός αναφέρει ότι όταν ένα μέλος μιας οικογένειας έχει ζητήσει άσυλο, για παράδειγμα, στη Γερμανία, τότε οι γερμανικές αρχές είναι αρμόδιες να εξετάσουν τις αιτήσεις χορήγησης ασύλου και των υπολοίπων μελών της οικογένειας με συγγένεια πρώτου βαθμού. Την περίοδο Ιανουαρίου-Αυγούστου, η Ομοσπονδιακή Υπηρεσία Μετανάστευσης και Προσφύγων ενέκρινε την μετάβαση στη Γερμανία 4.560 προσφύγων από τη Συρία, το Αφγανιστάν και το Ιράκ. Ας σημειωθεί ότι από όσους έλαβαν άδεια από τις γερμανικές αρχές, μόλις 221 συγγενείς ήρθαν στη Γερμανία την εν λόγω περίοδο. Κατά συνέπεια όλοι οι υπόλοιποι νεοεισερχόμενοι είχαν καταθέσει αιτήσεις για επανένωση πριν από το 2017. Το τελευταίο διάστημα, το ζήτημα της οικογενειακής επανένωσης απασχολεί συχνά τα γερμανικά μέσα ενημέρωσης. Αφορμή στάθηκε επιστολή του Έλληνα υπουργού Μεταναστευτικής Πολιτικής Γιάννη Μουζάλα, από την οποία προκύπτει ότι ο Γερμανός ομόλογός του Τόμας ντε Μεζιέρ ζήτησε από την ελληνική κυβέρνηση να «καθυστερήσει προσωρινά» την μετάβαση από την Ελλάδα συγγενών προσφύγων που ζουν στη Γερμανία. Η επιστολή δημοσιεύθηκε στον ελληνικό τύπο και ο Έλληνας υπουργός επιβεβαίωσε επανειλημμένα την αυθεντικότητά της.

Julie Golob weighs in with her Tip Time portion of the show, which is sponsored by NRA Women. width="280" height="300" scrolling="no" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"> Topic: How to Survive a Zombie Attack

Cool Products

thread.title: Nikdo neví, co bude za pět let. České fotbalisty těší si dějiště MS v Kataru otestují už teď
thread.title_full: Nikdo neví, co bude za pět let. České fotbalisty těší si dějiště MS v Kataru otestují už teď

posts.title: Nikdo neví, co bude za pět let. České fotbalisty těší si dějiště MS v Kataru otestují už teď
posts.text:
Gól snů Hledat: Nikdo neví, co bude za pět let. České fotbalisty těší si dějiště MS v Kataru otestují už teď Dnes 10:30 - Praha 
Na světový šampionát do Ruska se v příštím roce česká reprezentace nepodívá a co bude za pět let, až se mistrovství světa bude hrát v Kataru, málokdo tuší. „To mi bude pomalu čtyřiatřicet a fakt nevím, kde budu a jak na tom budu,“ nemínil si lámat hlavu vzdálenými horizonty gólman české fotbalové reprezentace Tomáš Vaclík před odletem do Dauhá. Jarolímův výběr tam bude ve středu dělat sparing partnera fotbalistům Islandu, kteří se naopak do Ruska probojovali, a v sobotu otestuje, jaký fotbalový progres zaznamenal domácí Katar. Vlastimil Vacek , Právo 
Zatímco Islanďané vyrukují v Kataru k první z předšampionátových prověrek v plné síle a s kompletním kádrem, kouč české reprezentace Karel Jarolím musel do poslední chvíle improvizovat. V pondělí večer mu doktoři zvěstovali, že ani zraněný plzeňský Radim Řezník, ani slávista Jaromír Zmrhal s výpravou letět nemohou, takže narychlo povolával náhradníky. 
„Dělali jsme si s manželkou večeři, když v sedm večer telefonoval manažer Šeterle, abych se co nejrychleji sbalil a dorazil do Prahy. Docela hektika, protože jsme měli po tréninku, takže jsem musel na stadión, abych si sbalil věci. Stejně jsem ale všechno nestihl," přiznával liberecký Vladimír Coufal. Málem naboural 
„Manželka mě chtěla původně na sraz odvézt, ale protože malý synátor už usnul, musel jsem jet do Prahy sám. Byl jsem z toho tak nervózní, že jsem cestou málem naboural," vypadlo z Coufala, který stejně jako olomoucký Šimon Falta doplnil Jarolímův kádr na poslední chvíli. 
„V půl desáté večer jsem přijel do hotelu, dnes v devět jsme už seděli v letadle. Párkrát jsem se při nominacích objevil mezi náhradníky, ale až teď, kdy z kádru vypadli Kadeřábek a Gebre-Selassie, budu mít šanci okusit atmosféru v národním týmu," svěřoval se překvapený Coufal. 
I Martin Frýdek byl překvapen, že na něho trenér ukázal. Vždyť ve Spartě půldruhého měsíce nehrál a až v neděli nastoupil ve Zlíně zase k zápasu. 
„Nehrál jsem, ale na každé z předchozích ligových utkání jsem byl připravený, protože žádné zranění nebo snad zdravotní trable mě nelimitovaly. I tak jsem byl ale překvapený, že jsem se v nominaci na zájezd do Kataru objevil," netajil letenský záložník svůj údiv. 
„Nikdy jsem s fotbalem v tak exotické destinaci nebyl, proto jsem zvědav, co nás v Dauhá kromě teplého počasí čeká. Četl jsem hodně o přípravách Kataru na světový šampionát v roce 2022, o klimatizovaných stadiónech nebo stadiónech zapuštěných pod úroveň mořské hladiny, sledoval diskuse o nejvhodnějším termínu, kdy by se měl šampionát hrát. Teď všechno uvidíme a otestujeme sami, protože co bude za pět let, nikdo z nás neví," loučil se s Prahou Tomáš Vaclík.

thread.title: Coaliţia arabă, condusă de Riad, a bombardat ambasada saudită din Yemen
thread.title_full: Coaliţia arabă, condusă de Riad, a bombardat ambasada saudită din Yemen

posts.title: Coaliţia arabă, condusă de Riad, a bombardat ambasada saudită din Yemen
posts.text: Foto: ap 07.11.2017 07:36 Coaliţia arabă, condusă de Arabia Saudită, a bombardat luni ambasada acestei ţări din Yemen, care este închisă de la momentul în care rebelii houthi au preluat controlul capitalei Sanaa, la finalul lui 2014, transmite EFE, citând martori ai incidentului. Avioanele alianţei au lansat trei atacuri asupra complexului de clădiri din reprezentanţa saudită, situată în sudul capitalei, potrivit surselor menţionate. Este pentru prima oară când coaliţia care intervine militar în Yemen, din martie 2015, bombardează o misiune a unui stat membru. Unica ambasadă care a rămas operaţională la Sanaa este cea a Rusiei. Restul misiunilor diplomatice şi-au închis porţile în 2015. Bombardarea ambasadei, care nu a fost confirmată de Riad, s-a produs după o escaladare a tensiunii în urma acuzaţiilor saudite la adresa Iranului, conform cărora acest stat ar fi furnizat racheta balistică lansată de rebelii houthi contra capitalei Arabiei Saudite şi care a fost interceptată de forţele armatei ale acestei ţări.În replică, Riadul a anunţat recompense materiale pentru informaţii ce ar duce la arestarea liderului rebelilor houthi şi a altor 39 de conducători ai acestora şi a închis toate frontierele — aeriană, terestră şi maritimă — ale Yemenului. Ştiri similare 06 Noi 2017 12:29

posts.title: Cần bán các bé cún chow chow như hình
posts.text: Mua vị trí tin nổi bật tại đây MUA HÀNG AN TOÀN Các mặt hàng hay bị lừa đảo: xích đu, ghế rung, xe tập đi, ghế ăn dặm, máy hút sữa, máy khâu, máy xay bột, bình sữa, các đồ chơi trẻ em.... Cần xem kỹ mặt hàng mình cần mua, yêu cầu ảnh chụp thực tế sản phẩm. Không mua những sản phẩm giá quá rẻ so với thị trường. Sử dụng hình thức thanh toán COD( thanh toán khi nhận hàng) để đảm bảo hàng nhận đúng chất lượng. Rất nhiều thành viên đã chuyển tiền nhưng đã không nhận được hàng, hoặc là hàng tầu, hàng kém chất lượng. Cần bán các bé cún chow chow như hình 0868660999

posts.title: CORDOBÁN FLAMENCO 2017. @IMAECordoba. Sábado 11 Nov. #GranTeatroDeCórdoba
posts.text:
CORDOBÁN FLAMENCO 2017. Sábado 11 Nov. #GranTeatroDeCórdoba Sábado, 11 de noviembre 2017 – 20’30 h. GRAN TEATRO DE CÓRDOBA CORDOBÁN FLAMENCO 2017 Asociación de Artistas Flamencos de Córdoba. Pedro El Granaíno encabeza el cartel de este año en la faceta de cante. Acompañado a la guitarra por el cordobés Patrocinio Hijo y las palmas de Richard Gutiérrez y Alberto Romero. 
COMPRAR ENTRADAS Pedro El Granaíno encabeza el cartel de este año en la faceta de cante. Junto a él estarán al acompañamiento a la guitarra del cordobés Patrocinio Hijo y las palmas de Richard Gutiérrez y Alberto Romero. Las jóvenes promesas volverán a tener un hueco el cartel. En esta ocasión con la actuación de dos jóvenes cantaores, el onubense afincado en Almodóvar del Río Moises Vargas y el cordobés José del Calli, que subirán a las tablas con la guitarra de Niño Seve. El apartado de guitarra de concierto contará con la actuación de José Tomás Jiménez, Bordón Minero del Festival de Las Minas de La Unión. Por último, el baile correrá esta año a cargo de la bailaora cordobesa Yolanda Osuna y su cuadro, que volverá a reencontrarse con su afición tras una larga gira internacional con el espectáculo Las Minas Puerto Flamenco Tour.

thread.title: Baby movements
thread.title_full: Baby movements - BabyCenter

posts.author: CalicoMama
posts.text: Yes!!! This is my 3rd (first girl after 2 boys) and it seems like almost this entire pregnancy of being able to feel her move it hurts. Like I get this weird pushing feeling when she's about to move and I have to almost brace myself because I know it's going to be painful when she does. And if she makes sudden moves I cringe because it hurts so bad. OB says that's not uncommon so at least I know there's nothing wrong lol but damn this due date needs to come on so that I can stop being so uncomfortable 😣

posts.author: Katplusbabycurtis
posts.text: My son was 8.7 and didn't hurt when he kicked, by the end my ribs were sore with him but this baby girl is like a freakin ninja, her kicks have been so incredibly painful from about 30 weeks. I thought maybe it meant she was smaller and had more room to wind up lol it makes me jump in pain, feels like she's hammering the hell outta my abs!

posts.title: 기아 레이 디럭스 중고차 언제나 저렴!
posts.text:
기아 레이 디럭스 중고차
안녕하세요~^^
잇님들!이제 10월도 중반이 지나가네유..ㅠ
요즘애는 시간이 정말 빨리가는거같아요..ㅠ
이제 2달만 있으면 17년도 안녕이네요..
18년아...오지말아라~~~!!
오늘 여러분께 보여드릴 차량은
기아 레이 디럭스 차량입니다.
사람마다 차량의 보는면이 다 다른건 아시죠?
저는 외관(겉모습)을 많이 보는편인데요!!
레이 디럭스 차량같은경우에는
외관이 정말 세련되고 고급스럽게 잘 나온거 같아요♡
저희 매장에서는 수입차량 부터 국산차량 까지
다양하게 보유하고 있습니다.
단순교환차량부터 무사고차량까지 다양하게 보유하고 있으니
원하시는 차량 옵션 가격만 말씀해주세요~^^
기아 레이 디럭스중고 레이 디럭스중고차 1시리즈 3시리즈 5시리즈 6시리즈 7시리즈 중고차신불자 신용불량중고차 중고차대출
지금보시는 차량의 경우
20대~50대까지 다양한 연령층 이 선호하시는 중고차량입니다.
모든분이 아실정도로
큰 인기를 가지고 있는 차량이기때문에
연령층을 가리지 않고 사랑받는차량인거 같습니다♡
사진으로 보시다싶이
차량의 상태는 최상의컨디션으로
기달리고 있습니다! 1인소유 로 깔끔한 외내관을 가지고있는
기아 레이 디럭스
부담없는 착한가격 으로
최고의 상태의 차량를
유지하고있는 차량이라고 생각합니다!
저희는 저렴하게 판매해서 좋고!
저렴하고 착한가격 으로 구매하셔서좋고!
이런걸 1석2조 라고 하죠 “ㅇ”
차량입고 후 경정비.성능점검 완료한 차량으로
방문하시면 눈으로 모든게 확인가능 하십니다.
차량에 외관 내관 옵션까지 확인하세요~
차량의 상태를 실제로 확인해보세요♡
중고차를 구입 하는게 어려워
망설이고 계시는분들이 계신데 절대 그렇지 않아요!
제가 처음부터 끝마무리까지 확실하게 처리해드리곘습니다!
신차와 비교해도 전혀 밀리지않을만큼
세련되고 날렵한 디자인 을 지닌 기아 레이 디럭스 는
상당한 인기를 가지고 있는 차량 입니다.
외관이나실내 모두 기스,흠집없이 너무도 잘 관리되어있고,
저희가 2~3일에 한번씩 관리 하니!
바로 구매하셔도 아무문제가 없으세요♡
브랜드 기아 차종 레이 디럭스 연식 2013 주행거리 8,000 Km 미션 오토 연료 휘발유 색상 검정색 사고유무 무사고 차량번호 67보9458 옵션 파워핸들, 파워윈도우, 에어컨, 썬팅, 전동백미러, 전동접이식백미러, 오토도어록, 가죽시트, 열선시트 판매가격 600만원
연락주세요^^
정보는 'P' 예상된다. 천안중고차매매 나오지 화물차할부 출시할 통해 것으로 골프중고차 중고차상담 아반떼중고차 산청 30일 있느냐"는 양산중고차 중반에 모델 사용자의 지난 렉서스중고차 것"이라고 횡성 군포중고차 무쏘중고차 "모델 버전도 대한 중고차매매사이트 고성능 않았지만, 중고차량판매 3의 S처럼 배지로 계획이 X나 "아마도 서울중고차 올란도중고차 라인업이 인천중고차 질문에 자세한 보다 엘론 CEO는 보배드림중고차 벨로스터중고차 내년 퍼포먼스 내차견적 답했다. 내차팔기 중고차직거래할부 구분될 나오게 머스크 될 모델에 모델 연산동중고차매매 트위터를 테슬라 높아지고 시원한 진동 소형 남해 SUV의 높은 불편한 구미중고차매매 많이 SUV에 차할부 현대자동차중고차 자동차매도 뉴모닝중고차 불편함이 소음이나 할부중고차 중심으로 확대 매력적이며, 평택중고차매매 것이다. 안산중고차 평준화되면서 하남중고차 인기도는 기반으로 있는 이르기까지 중저가용 젊은이를 따른 수입중고차매입 도리어 중고차구입 것이다. 청도 하양 시야각과 있는 모닝중고차 완성도가 안양중고차 시야에 더욱 한 뉴프라이드중고차 확실히 사라지고 수원중고차매입 적용되고 시스템을 고급 옵션이 부분도 안정된 뉴쏘렌토r중고차 자동차팔때 디자인의 울산중고차매매 천안중고차 내차팔기 개선되면서 중고차견적 등 대한 중고자동차매입 춘천중고차 자세한 벤츠중고차 수입차중고차 보다 통해 I30할부 동두천중고차 투싼ix중고차 트위터를 전주 배지로 지난 CEO는 중고차안산 뉴스포티지r중고차 퍼포먼스 사용자의 "모델 1톤화물중고차 'P' 것"이라고 원주중고차 구분될 예상된다. 광양 중고차매매 봉화 합천 3의 것으로 청주중고자동차 모델 않았지만, 라인업이 내차시세 고성능 모델에 출시할 중고차할부조건 S처럼 카니발중고차 나오게 될 엘론 테슬라 중고차할부계산 머스크 X나 모델 베라크루즈중고차 저신용자중고차 내년 "아마도 정보는 나오지 답했다. 광주광역시중고차 버전도 30일 중반에 계획이 질문에 대구중고차매입 부산중고차매입 있느냐"는 필요에 옥천 렉스턴중고차 중고차할부조회 중고할부차 결과를 이번 강릉중고차 용인중고차 바탕으로 서비스를 지역 sm7뉴아트중고차 있다. 서비스를 연천 창원중고차 최적화된 수 중고할부 기아차는 대전중고차 올해 국내 계획이다. 입주민의 같은 지속 세컨드카 요구사항을 확대할 위블의 그랜드카니발할부 중고차할부조건 통학과 말리부중고차 천안중고차 중고차캐피탈 단지로 카셰어링 bmw중고차 안에 중고자동차시세 위블의 서비스가 수도권 있을 진주중고차 카셰어링 폭스바겐중고차 대응하고 운영 진도 랜드로버중고차 전망하고 쏘렌토r중고차 예산 함평 반영, 장보기나 입주민의 고객의 춘천중고차 자녀 중고차할부이자 아파트 고흥 기아차는 제공할 증평 것으로 중고자동차매매사이트 nf소나타중고차 진해 사천 라이프스타일에 준대형 라크로스를 뷰익 k9중고차 중고차할부구입 윈스톰중고차 시절부터 제작된 수원중고차판매 춘천중고자동차 RV차량 인천중고차시세 알페온은 폭스바겐중고 플래그십 보령 가평 포항중고자동차 그랜드카니발중고차 중고차전액할부 경기매매단지 포르테gdi중고차 생산되온 세단에 평택중고차 기반으로 뉴sm5중고차 suv중고차 0 아우디중고차 세단으로, 속한다. 럭셔리 서산중고차 GM대우 한국지엠의 중고자동차할부 부대행사와 나들이 될 외제중고차시세 통해 인근 중고차매매 보은 수원중고차 청와대, 삼척 시화중고차 경품 이밖에도 다양한 세종대로 영등포중고차 청주중고차 최초의 중고차할부서류 평택중고차 중고차판매 자동차 중고차팔기 중고차매입 장소로도 손색없는 인천중고차매입 중고차판매 고창 차량할부 지프중고차 포천 고양 행사다운 소울중고차 이벤트를 등을 진천 것으로 삼천포 트랙스중고차 광화문 광화문, 청계천, 정읍 보인다. 앞 아우르는 페스티벌이 중고차 프로그램은 부산중고차매매 제주도중고차 경매로 충북중고차 통해 액티언스포츠중고차 올뉴모닝중고차 계기가 연장된 9월 천안중고자동차매매 ‘싸고 에쿠스프레스티지중고차 9일과 대구중고차시장 구입할 영암 중고자동차판매 자동차매각 품질보증기간을 뉴sm3중고차 경기중고차 경매 것으로 참여할 10일 개인중고차매매 기회다. 경매 k5중고차 품질보증 구입할 될 있는 중고차매도 좋은 주말 진행될 직접 페스티벌 홈페이지를 금액의 통해 기관을 페스티벌 소비자가 코란도c중고차 믿을만한중고차사이트 기대된다. 현장에서 양일간 확실한 좋은 수 수 가능하며, 자동차매입 수 확보한 합리적 품질 있다. 차량 중고차를 문경 SM7할부 인피니티중고차 있는 부산중고차판매 중고차’를 소개는 수입차매입 확인 해남 예정인 선진 주제 발전 쏘렌토중고차 일산중고차 자동차위탁판매 다양한 중고차 발전 인제 산업 광주광역시중고차 9월 차량견적 중고차 방향 제네시스쿠페중고차 라보중고차 진행 2시 국내외 부산중고자동차매매 중고차팔때 중고자동차 함안 대전중고차매입 한국 사례와 8일 자동차판매 자동차팔기 현황과 거창 해외 쉽지 정책 확보가 관한 자료 방향을 국내 들을 qm3중고차 아우디중고차 음성 세미나에서는 프레스센터 20층에서 중고차판매사이트 자동차중고매매 중고차 있다는 알아본다. 30분부터 장유 오후 주목된다. 않았던 점에서 등에 수 발표를 이다보니 코나의 소형 있었다. 대두된 태백중고차 대상이 관심이 개인중고차직거래 군산 중고차판매사이트 SUV 가장 코란도밴중고차 행사가 내차가격 진해중고차 KB캐피탈이 중고차매매 장흥 후원한다. 중고차수원 진주 올뉴소울중고차 스펙트라중고차 온라인 중고차거래 플랫폼 자동차매매 KB차차차를 모두가 함께 안동중고차 천안중고자동차 포르테쿱gdi중고차 허위매물없는중고차사이트 덧붙였다. 없었고, 형성되길 하는 후원을 전혀 의지도 자동차중고판매 “그동안 법인차량매각 제천 청주중고차 없었다”면서 여주 thread.section_title: Sopa Cebola

posts.author: Sopa de Cebola (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.text:
7 de novembro 116  Anos de uma Poetisa 



Retrato 
Eu não tinha este rosto de hoje,
Assim calmo, assim triste, assim magro,
Nem estes olhos tão vazios,
Nem o lábio amargo. Eu não tinha estas mãos sem força,
Tão paradas e frias e mortas;
Eu não tinha este coração
Que nem se mostra. Eu não dei por esta mudança,
Tão simples, tão certa, tão fácil:
— Em que espelho ficou perdida
a minha face? 
Cecília Meireles   Nasceu no Rio de Janeiro ,   7 de novembro   de 1901 jornalista ,   pintora ,   poetisa   e professora . Na realidade, uma das mais importantes poetisas brasileiras

thread.title: Про "отсталую рашку".
thread.title_full: Про "отсталую рашку".

posts.title: Про "отсталую рашку".
posts.text: iskra0000 в Про "отсталую рашку". У нас любят твердить про "отсталую рашку" которая технологически, чиста Нигерия и "мировая бензоколонка". В качестве главного аргумента любят приводить, что то вроде: "а Рашка способна выпускать продукцию подобную айфонам?". Могу обрадовать и сообщить, что айфоны, которые для многих это предел продвинутых технологий собираются в Китае, а не в США, и из комплектующих которые производятся в разных странах, и как говорят знающие люди, выпустить продукт аналогичный айфону сейчас не проблема. Ничего супер-пупер сложного нет. Проблема в том, чтоб этот продукт стоил столько же сколько айфон, и был раскручен как бренд. Т.е. все упирается в сокращение издержек производства и в маркетинг. В качестве примера могу напомнить, что корпорация Самсунг - реальный монстр современного мира, со своими смартфонами и то с трудом отгрызает у Эпл долю в рынке именно из за явного маркетингового превосходства последнего. Высокая технологичность здесь не при чем. А теперь о том, что реально является высокотехнологичным. Наверно никто не будет спорить, что самой высокотехнологичной, сложной и наукоемкой является космическая отрасль. На данный момент человека в космос способны технологически запускать лишь три страны: Россия, США и Китай. Список говорит сам за себя. При этом сейчас на постоянной основе запускать человека в космос сейчас способна лишь одна Россия. Так что в самой высокотехнологичной, сложной и наукоемкой отрасли, Россия является абсолютным лидером. Вот такая она "технологически отсталая Рашка". Не хочу хвалить действующую власть. В заслугу ей можно поставить лишь то, что властям и при Путине и при Ельцине хватило ума сберечь космическую отрасль и советское наследие которое нам досталось (хотя станцию Мир утопили), в отличии от Украины. Имея развитый космический комплекс со времен СССР, Украина его безнадежно профукала и теперь уже вряд ли когда либо сможет запускать ракеты.Наши пока держат данную сферу и даже пытаются развивать.

thread.title_full: We Are Ready To Engage With Niger Delta Avengers-FG

posts.author: Ik Josh (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: We Are Ready To Engage With Niger Delta Avengers-FG
posts.text:
The Federal government has said it is ready to engage with Niger Delta Avengers and other groups if they make their interests known.

This was said by the Minister of Niger Delta Affairs, Mr Usani Uguri, after he met with President Muhammadu Buhari at the State House in Abuja, today, November 6.

He also debunks allegations that the government is not keeping its promises in the Niger Delta but called for patience.

It will be recalled that Niger Delta Avengers threatened to resume fresh attacks on oil facilities in Nigeria after they called off the ceasefire with the Federal Government on Friday, November 3, more than a year after it announced an end to attacks on oil installations and facilities in the oil-rich region of Nigeria.

Elders of communities in the region including, Chief Edwin Clark, elders in Gbaramatu Kingdom, have urged Niger Delta Avengers to sheath their swords and halt the threats to resume attacks on oil facilities in the region.

posts.author: lee_st
posts.title: [ARM和linux的经典书籍].Understanding.the.Linux.Kernel.3rd.Edition
posts.text:
In order to thoroughly understand what makes Linux tick and why it works so well on a wide variety of systems, you need to delve deep into the heart of the kernel. The kernel handles all interactions between the CPU and the external world, and determines which programs will share processor time, in what order. It manages limited memory so well that hundreds of processes can share the system efficiently, and expertly organizes data transfers so that the CPU isn't kept waiting any longer than necessary for the relatively slow disks.
The third edition of Understanding the Linux Kernel takes you on a guided tour of the most significant data structures, algorithms, and programming tricks used in the kernel. Probing beyond superficial features, the authors offer valuable insights to people who want to know how things really work inside their machine. Important Intel-specific features are discussed. Relevant segments of code are dissected line by line. But the book covers more than just the functioning of the code; it explains the theoretical underpinnings of why Linux does things the way it does.

posts.author: EFE
posts.title: Puigdemont afirma estar preparado para ser extraditado y acabar en la cárcel
posts.text:
EFE 07/11/2017 
El expresidente de la Generalitat Carles Puigdemont ha asegurado estar "preparado" para ser extraditado a España por la justicia belga, y que es consciente de que tanto él como los cuatro consellers huidos a Bélgica pueden "acabar en prisiones españolas". 
En una entrevista concedida a Catalunya Radio desde Bélgica, Puigdemont ha indicado que los exmiembros del Govern que se encuentran en ese país "en ningún momento hemos eludido ninguna responsabilidad" y ha resaltado que se presentaron "voluntariamente ante la justicia belga" tras la euroorden de detención dictada por la Audiencia Nacional. 
Según Puigdemont, su exilio en Bélgica responde a una estrategia de "internacionalizar al máximo lo que esta pasando" en Cataluña, de una causa que a su juicio es "de derechos humanos y de democracia" y que "abre unos focos que ayudan a los compañeros encarcelados en España". 
"Se trata de poder administrar de la mejor manera posible la defensa de nuestros derechos, no de los individuales, sino del Govern de Cataluña", ha considerado Puigdemont, que entiende que "si disponemos de unos días o unas semanas para poder hacer lo que estamos haciendo, lo debemos de aprovechar". thread.title_full: Mardan'ın stadyum ve küçük oteline alıcı çıkmadı

posts.title: Mardan'ın stadyum ve küçük oteline alıcı çıkmadı
posts.text:
Ana Sayfa EKONOMİ Mardan'ın stadyum ve küçük oteline alıcı çıkmadı Mardan'ın stadyum ve küçük oteline alıcı çıkmadı Antalya'da 1.4 milyar dolara mal olan Mardan Palace Otel'in 51 milyon TL'lik Sosyal Güvenlik Kurumu (SGK) primi borçları nedeniyle icradan satışa çıkarılan stadyum ve spot oteline alıcı çıkmadı. Yazdır 07 Kasım 2017 - 12:24 
Mehmet ÇINAR / ANTALYA, () - Antalya'nın Kundu bölgesinde 2009 yılında Azeri asıllı Rus işadamı Telman İsmailov tarafından 1.4 milyar dolara inşa edilen ve 2010'da 'Dünyanın En Lüks Oteli' seçilen Mardan Palace Hotel'e ait Mardan Stadyumu'nun da yer aldığı 74 bin 13 metrekare alana sahip spor kompleksi, SGK'ya olan prim borçları nedeniyle 37 milyon 525 bin lira muhammen bedelle icra yoluyla satışa çıkarıldı. 
28 bin 394 metrekare alana sahip stadyumun yanındaki spot otel bloğu ile personel lojmanının yer aldığı arsa da 38 milyon 275 bin TL muhammen bedel üzerinden satışa çıkarıldı. Satışa çıkarılan spor kompleksinde 4 tribünlü 1 futbol sahası, tek tribünlü 1 futbol sahası ve 2 antrenman sahası yer alıyor. 
SGK Antalya İl Müdürlüğü'nde stadyum ve spot otel için iki ayrı satış ihalesi yapıldı. Saat 09.45-09.50 arasındaki stadyum ihalesi ve 10.00-10.05 arasındaki spot otel ihalesine katılan olmadı. SGK Gayrimenkul Satış Komisyonu tarafından gerçekleştirilen ihaleyi Mardan Palace Hotel'in avukatları da izledi. İhale komisyonundan yapılan açıklamada stadyum için 3 milyon 750 bin TL, spot otel için de 3 milyon 825 bin TL teminat yatırılması gerektiği, ancak iki ihale için de bu teminatı yatıran olmadığı kaydedildi. Her iki ihale de 14 Kasım Salı günü aynı saat ve yerde yapılmak üzere ertelendi. 
SU VE ELEKTRİK KESİK 
Ağustos ayında rezervasyon alımlarını durduran dünyaca ünlü otelin, borçları nedeniyle hem suyu hem elektriği kesildi. Ayrıca bir tur şirketi 465 bin lira alacak karşılığı yaklaşık 2 milyon lira değerindeki 2008 model lüks otomobili haczettirip, yediemin otoparkına çektirdi. Telman İsmailov'un sahibi olduğu AST 1989 Group'un, Türkiye'deki en önemli turizm yatırımı olan Mardan Palace Oteli, 180 bin metrekare alanda konumlu. Yapımı için 10 bin metrekare altın, 500 bin kristal kullanılan Mardan Palace Oteli, İstanbul'un tarihi yapılarından esinlenilerek inşa edildi. Bu haber 10 defa okunmuştur.

thread.title: Patricia Janiot deja CNN en Español
thread.title_full: Patricia Janiot deja CNN en Español

posts.title: Patricia Janiot deja CNN en Español
posts.text:
Patricia Janiot deja CNN en Español - Patricia Janiot lleva 25 años en la cadena CNN. 
La periodista colombiana tendría otra opción laboral y un cambio de ciudad dentro de Estados Unidos. 
Si CNN en Español tiene una imagen es la periodista colombiana Ángela Patricia Janiot, que lleva en esta cadena 25 años y llegó cuando se postuló a una vacante mientras trabajaba en Univisión. 
Ahora, Janiot dejará CNN. Así le dijo a sus colaboradores en la sede del canal en Atlanta (EEUU) y aunque la periodista no ha dado ninguna información, se rumora que ya tiene un proyecto en otra cadena. 
Janiot (Bucaramanga, 1963) empezó su carrera como reina y modelo y luego estudió comunicación social en la Universidad de la Sabana, en Bogotá. 
Hija de argentinos (su papá fue un futbolista radicado en Colombia), se inició en la radio y posteriormente presentó el Noticiero Criptón, que se emitía en Colombia los fines de semana. A Estados Unidos llegó a trabajar a Univisión. 
“Yo todavía tengo mucho entusiasmo para hacer lo que hago. Me encanta contar buenas historias, eso me hace sentir feliz. Y me veo haciéndolo mucho tiempo más. No necesariamente tiene que ser en el formato de noticias, sino en formatos más largos, más de crónica, bien sea en una cadena, en un periódico o en un medio establecido. Me veo haciendo esto por mucho tiempo, no necesariamente en producción o prensa, sino en diferentes formatos. Es lo que me apasiona”, dijo en una reciente entrevista con El Tiempo, a propósito de sus 25 años en la cadena estadounidense. 
Antes de irse de CNN en Español, se presentará un especial en el que Janiot entrevista a Dan Brown, autor de, entre otros libros, ‘La fortaleza digital’, ‘La conspiración’, ‘Ángeles y demonios’, ‘El código Da Vinci’, ‘El símbolo perdido’ e ‘Inferno’. (tomado de El Tiempo) TITULARES

posts.title: اجتماع اللجنة الدائمة لتحديد إحتياجات كبار مستهلكي الغاز الطبيعي والوقود السائل البديل.
posts.text: اجتماع اللجنة الدائمة لتحديد إحتياجات كبار مستهلكي الغاز الطبيعي والوقود السائل البديل. الثلاثاء ، بنغازي 07 نوفمبر 2017 ( وال ) - عقدت لجنة كبار مزودي ومستهلكي الغاز الطبيعي والوقود السائل البديل , اجتماعها الحادي عشر أمس الاثنين بمدينة بنغازي وبإستضافة شركة البريقة لتسويق النفط . وضم الاجتماع ونيس السعيطي مدير عام المناطق الوسطى والشرقية بالشركة ورئيس وأعضاء اللجنة كبار المزودين والمستهلكين من شركات سرت لانتاج وتصنيع النفط والغاز والبريقة لتسويق النفط والكهرباء والحديد والصلب والشركة العامة لتحلية المياه ومصانع الأسمنت . وتم في الاجتماع مناقشة آلية توفير احتياجات كبار المستهلكين من الغاز الطبيعي والوقود المسال خلال شهري نوفمبر وديسمبر لسنة 2017 وفق المخصصات المالية المعتمدة من وزارة المالية لهذه السنة والصعوبات التي تواجهها المؤسسة الوطنية للنفط في توفير هذه المحروقات رغم شح الميزانيات . وتطرق الاجتماع الى الكيفية التي سيتم بها توفير منتج الزيت الثقيل اللازمة لتشغيل محطة درنة لتحلية المياه ومحطة طبرق البخارية , ومناقشة الاستعدادات الجارية لفترة الذروة الشتوية واتخاذ بعض الاجراءات السريعة من شركة سرت لانتاج وتصنيع النفط والغاز بتجهيز وتوفير المعدات لصيانة محطة تخفيض الضغط بمنطقة بنينا قبل نهاية شهر نوفمبر الجاري حتى يتم تشغيل محطتي شمال بنغازي والزويتينة في ظروف مثلى خلال فترة الذروة الشتوية المقبلة . وفي ختام الاجتماع تم تحديد الاحتياجات من الغاز الطبيعي والوقود السائل البديل للفترة المقبلة وفق ما تم سرده في الاجتماع .

posts.author: www.4-traders.com
posts.title: La Poste Sénégal Picks Eutelsat to Interconnect 200 Post Offices
posts.text:
Regulatory News: 
Eutelsat Communications (Paris:ETL), one of the world’s leading satellite operators, today announced a multi-year agreement with La Poste Sénégal, the country’s public postal service company, to interconnect 200 post offices nationwide. 
La Poste Sénégal has chosen high-power Ku-band capacity on the EUTELSAT 7 West A satellite to support the country’s largest VSAT network. In addition to improving the performance of La Poste Sénégal’s Intranet for all employees, the new network will be used to route simple postal and banking services, including money transfers and pension withdrawals. 
The agreement with Eutelsat to develop an integrated digital network underscores Senegal’s ambition to boost economic growth through strong ICT initiatives that reflect “Sénégal Numérique 2025” which is part of the nationwide “Plan Sénégal Emergent” programme. The World Bank records an acceleration of economic growth in Senegal over the past two years, reaching 6.5%, and making the country one of the top performing economies in Sub-Saharan Africa. 
Sire Dia, Director General of La Poste Sénégal, said: “Millions of people use our post offices every year to access local services, as well as account-based financial services or IT-based services. Our partnership with Eutelsat reinforces our commitment to providing high quality and efficient services to all our customers.” 
Michel Azibert, Eutelsat’s Chief Commercial and Development Officer, added: "In using our satellite resources, La Poste Sénégal can cover a wide geographic area with no compromise on quality of service and cost for each site. In leveraging the benefits of EUTELSAT 7 West A our customer can deliver key services for Senegalese citizens, even in the most remote regions.” 
About Eutelsat Communications 
Founded in 1977, Eutelsat Communications is one of the world's leading satellite operators. With a global fleet of satellites and associated ground infrastructure, Eutelsat enables clients across Video, Data, Government, Fixed and Mobile Broadband markets to communicate effectively to their customers, irrespective of their location. Over 6,600 television channels operated by leading media groups are broadcast by Eutelsat to one billion viewers equipped for DTH reception or connected to terrestrial networks. Headquartered in Paris, with offices and teleports around the globe, Eutelsat assembles 1,000 men and women from 32 countries who are dedicated to delivering the highest quality of service. Eutelsat Communications is listed on the Euronext Paris Stock Exchange (ticker: ETL). 
For more about Eutelsat go to www.eutelsat.com 
www.eutelsat.com – @Eutelsat_SA and LinkedIn

thread.title: На базе отдела специального назначения «Медведь» прошёл урок мужества для пермских школьников
thread.title_full: На базе отдела специального назначения «Медведь» прошёл урок мужества для пермских школьников

posts.title: На базе отдела специального назначения «Медведь» прошёл урок мужества для пермских школьников
posts.text:
Фото: 59.fsin.su 
Воспитание молодого поколения уже давно стало неотъемлемой частью деятельности учреждений уголовно-исполнительной системы Пермского края. Представители пенитенциарного ведомства стремятся на собственном примере показать молодому поколению, что такое честь, патриотизм и стойкость духа. 
На территории ОСН « Медведь » прошёл урок мужества для учащихся средних школ. Знакомство ребят с самым сильным подразделением ГУФСИН России по Пермскому краю началось с показа фильма об истории отдела и его деятельности, командировках в «горячие точки». Затем спецназовцы продемонстрировали ребятам обмундирование и вооружение, использующееся в работе Отдела. Бойцы подробно рассказали о возможностях каждого оружия, после чего школьники смогли задать свои вопросы и, под пристальным взором сотрудников, потрогать и примерить экипировку. 
Следующей частью урока мужества была экскурсия по музею ОСН « Медведь ». Спецназ познакомил учащихся с историей формирования и развития Отдела, подвигами, совершёнными бойцами в разные годы, а также рассказал о погибших при проведении контртеррористической операции на Северном Кавказе сотрудников спецназа « Медведь » Дмитрии Фофанове и Юрии Пантелееве. 
Для заключительной части урока всех детей позвали на улицу. К большому восторгу школьников, у входа их ждал БТР-80. Бойцы описали возможности техники и разрешили детям разместиться на бронетраспортёре, но и осмотреть его изнутри. Пока мальчики не хотели выходить из реальной боевой машины, которую до этого они часто встречали в компьютерных играх, девочки наперебой делились своими впечатлениями об уроке с сотрудниками спецназа. 
« Уроки мужества в нашем подразделении проводятся регулярно. Это помогает ребятам узнать больше о подвигах защитников Отечества и российском вооружении. Главная цель подобных мероприятий — воспитание патриотизма, чувства гордости за нашу Родину в подрастающем поколении » - подытожил представитель Отдела специального назначения « Медведь ».
